description: Birds of a feather gather together "At the Birdbath"! Nestled among multi-hued hydrangeas and sunny-yellow rudbeckia, this lovely birdbath is the place colorful feathered friends flock to! Mr. Evening Grosbeak seems to be on a roll about something, while the Northern Cardinal and Eastern Bluebird patiently wait to get a word in edgewise. The sparrow may be muttering to the passing monarch butterfly, but the American Goldfinch just came for a quick drink and is staying out of it. Fun for all and a perfect puzzle for any bird-watcher or nature-lover! This 500-piece Large Format jigsaw puzzle combines easy-to-handle, clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s perfect interlocking fit for a most pleasurable puzzling experience. With pieces 20% larger than standard, details are easy to see so you can complete it in just a day or two. Create memorable moments with Ravensburger premium puzzles!
